# Privacy Policy - Dopamine Dasher

**Last Updated: January 24, 2026**

## Overview

Dopamine Dasher ("we," "us," "our," or "the App") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our application.

---

## 1. Information We Collect

### Information You Provide Directly:
- **Account Information**: Email, name (optional)
- **Brain Check Responses**: Your nervous system state, mood, tasks, available time
- **Task Data**: Tasks you create, completion status, time spent
- **AI Coach Conversations**: Messages you send to Dashie, techniques you try
- **Feedback**: Any feedback or support requests you submit

### Information Collected Automatically:
- **Usage Data**: Features used, time spent in app, interaction patterns
- **Device Information**: Device type, OS, app version
- **Technical Data**: IP address, browser type, crash logs

---

## 2. How We Use Your Information

We use your information to:
- Provide and improve the App
- Personalize your experience (Brain Check recommendations, AI Coach suggestions)
- Track which techniques help you (to improve recommendations)
- Send support emails and respond to feedback
- Analyze usage patterns to improve features
- Comply with legal obligations

**We do NOT:**
- Sell your data to third parties
- Share your data with advertisers
- Use your data for marketing outside the App
- Store your full conversation history indefinitely

---

## 3. Data Security

Your data is protected by:
- **Encryption in Transit**: TLS/SSL encryption for all data transfers
- **Encryption at Rest**: Database encryption for stored data
- **Authentication**: OAuth 2.0 + JWT tokens
- **Access Control**: Only authorized staff can access data
- **Regular Backups**: Automatic daily backups

---

## 4. Data Storage & Location

- **Where**: Your data is stored in secure cloud databases
- **How Long**: We retain your data as long as your account is active
- **After Deletion**: Data is permanently deleted within 30 days of account deletion

---

## 5. Your Rights

You have the right to:
- **Access**: Download your data at any time
- **Delete**: Delete your account and all associated data
- **Correct**: Update your information
- **Opt-Out**: Disable data collection (some features may not work)

To exercise these rights, email us at support@dopaminedasher.com

---

## 6. Third-Party Services

We use the following third-party services:
- **Authentication**: Manus OAuth (login)
- **AI**: OpenAI (for AI Coach responses)
- **Hosting**: Manus Infrastructure (data storage)

These services have their own privacy policies. We recommend reviewing them.

---

## 7. Children's Privacy

Dopamine Dasher is intended for ages 13+. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13. If we discover we have, we will delete it immediately.

---

## 8. Changes to This Policy

We may update this policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes via email or in-app notification.

---

## 9. Contact Us

Questions about this privacy policy? Email us:
- **support@dopaminedasher.com**

---

## 10. Important Disclaimer

**Dopamine Dasher is not a medical device or replacement for professional mental health treatment.** If you are experiencing a mental health crisis, please contact:
- **National Suicide Prevention Lifeline**: 988 (US)
- **Crisis Text Line**: Text HOME to 741741
- **International Association for Suicide Prevention**: https://www.iasp.info/resources/Crisis_Centres/

---

**By using Dopamine Dasher, you agree to this Privacy Policy.**
